citations.narrative:
The opossum enclosure is not surrounded by a perimeter fence. Lack of a perimeter fence cannot keep unwanted
animals and unauthorized persons from having contact with the opossums. It also cannot function as a secondary
containment system for the animal. The opossums's outdoor housing enclosure must be enclosed by a perimeter fence at
least 6 feet high and at least 3 feet from the enclosure.
Correct by July 15, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.127(d) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
The opossum enclosure is not surrounded by a perimeter fence. Lack of a perimeter fence cannot keep unwanted 
animals and unauthorized persons from having contact with the opossums. It also cannot function as a secondary 
containment system for the animal. The opossums's outdoor housing enclosure must be enclosed by a perimeter fence at 
least 6 feet high and at least 3 feet from the enclosure. 
 
Correct by July 15, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
